attributes.action: Bigger Penalties for Parking in Disabled Bays With No Blue Badge
attributes.background: Disabled people need parking bays which are easily accessible to services. Unfortunately, too many people are misusing these bay.

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of car park operators and local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230047
